Hello for Florida, Just joined and am fairly new to japanese sword 
collecting. I have created an album under Verne and they are pics of 
a sword I just found at an antique shop.Would like some opinons, not 
signed. Could be a shorted katana bordering on wakasashi length. The 
sword had just been brought in by a WW2 vet's widow of which he will 
give me her name to verify the story.I need help on identifying the 
hamo, it is active and on both side there are a couple of pea shaped 
temper spots floating over the main temper.
Thanks
Verne
